Reviews.Title: “Dated facilities”
Reviews.Author: eemsdad
Reviews.Content: We were greeted in our room by 70s decor and a giant centepede.The staff was great, but the facilities are in serious need of updating. We only stayed one night, so it wasn't a huge deal.

Reviews.Title: “Offering my opinion so it could help someone to decide to stay at Hampton Inn Miami/Dadeland.”
Reviews.Author: Dalays V
Reviews.Content: One of my favorites hotels of the Hilton Famiy is the Hampton Inn Miami/Dadeland. Great rooms, service, location, and staff.

Reviews.Title: “Courteous and attentive staff”
Reviews.Author: Rae T
Reviews.Content: This was our second time to stay at this particular Hampton Inn, and would not hesitate to return, with the main reason being the staff. The evening manager, Pedro, was always ready with a restaurant recommendation, or just a heartfelt greeting. The breakfast staff was also top notch, trying their best to keep everything clean and well stocked, and the hotel was sold out for the week-end, so there was always a crowd. The only thing that keeps me from giving it a "5" is that their bathrooms could use some updating. Everything worked, but both the faucets and the wall paper were in needed to be replaced.

Reviews.Title: “comfortable and good location”
Reviews.Author: jorgecancun
Reviews.Content: This is a good hotel, with rooms spacious and comfortable, the bathroom also spacious with good amenities. Its location is very good if you go shopping. It has free shuttle service to dolphin mall and Dadeland Mall as well, but you can walk without problem. You can have breakfast included, is light enough. Overall a good experience.

Reviews.Title: “I Like what I see..”
Reviews.Author: prisky
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 3 nights. Our king suite was very spacious. The bed was very comfortable. Bathroom was a good size. TV had a good selection of channels. Internet worked very well with excellent download speeds. The gym was good with a couple of treadmills, cycling machines. It also had weights. The breakfast was excellent. There was a great selection of pastries, breads, waffle machine, hot buffet (egg, bacon, sausage), yoghurt, coffee/tea. The complimentary apples was a nice touch. The front desk staff were excellent. The AM manager was amazing, I never met someone that speak so many languages. The place is busy but we never had problems with finding a car park. As a bonus the hotel is very close to the Dadeland shopping mall. Location wise it was central to the places we wanted to visit. It took about 30 minutes to get to South Beach and 60 minutes to reach the Everglades On my next miami trip I will defintely return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: AgentXman
Reviews.Content: Checkin was fast. Pedro made sure everything was ok with my room. Breakfast was good. The only complaint would be the water pressure. other then that it was a great hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Stay with Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: tonic5080
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed three nights (two separate rooms) in December 2011. The staff was very friendly and a full breakfast bar was offered. The rooms were clean and comfortable--although they seemed a little worn. The location was ideal for us, although it was a bit tricky finding the hotel (it is tucked behind a few other buildings). That being said, It also was a quiter location. Since we are nonsmokers (my husband suffers with Asthma), I was worried that this was not a smoke free hotel. However, we didn't notice smoke in the hallways or our room. :)

Reviews.Title: “Great Choice”
Reviews.Author: ymid
Reviews.Content: Used a Hilton Honors Reward stay. Got a King room with a sitting area. Clean, very friendly staff. Centrally located on US 1 south to Key West. Directions are wonky though. The hotels's map was wrong and for ince the GPS was correct. You have to pass SW 70th and turn right on SW 80th to get there. I dont understand why. Can't beat a Hampton Inn for price and quality though.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Samsie
Reviews.Content: We spent nine days at this hotel over the Christmas period and had a lovely time here. The room was nice and quiet and daily housekeeping was of a good standard. Breakfast area was kept clean and had a good selection of breakfast items like bagels, cereal, fruit juices and yogurt. Items were replenished quickly when they had run out. Swimming pool area is also clean and quiet. It is located a short distance from both the Dadeland mall (nicely appointed mall with Nordstrom, JC Penneys, Saks and Florida's largest Macys as anchors) and metro station which goes into downtown Miami. We did not use a car but there is plenty of parking in the hotel's grounds and locally. Would like to thank all those on the front desk particularly Antonio for their above and beyond service and help shown to us throughout our holiday (particularly on the morning when our son needed to visit hospital). We will certainly return here on out next visit to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Fran L
Reviews.Content: My husband I and were in Miami to attend a family wedding in November 2011. We chose this hotel for its location, free parking, gym, no smoking rooms and lobby, and free breakfast - and we are glad we did! Our room, as well as the lobby, and breakfast area were clean and and had an updated look. We were greeted by Pedro Ortiz, at the Front Desk. He has outstanding customer service skills, and made us feel like VIPs from the moment we entered the hotel. Breakfast was lovely, and included hot entrees, fresh fruit and yogart,and a wide assortment of hot and cold beverages. It was attended by 2 women who made certain it was always well plenished-and they came around to every table making certain all was fine. I highly recomment this Miami treasure of a hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet and good price”
Reviews.Author: arusig
Reviews.Content: Modern, clean and quite hotel. Finally I saw an hotel in US with vending machine far from the rooms in a dedicated area! Big room (non-smoking) with king beds and very clean bathroom. Free wi-fi internet. Staff very gentle. Breakfast good wtih fresh fruits. As in all US, pubblic transport close to zero to reach this hotel. Wide parking lot. Shopping malls very close. Cheaper than corresponding hotels in Miami downtown (city center), but quite far from it, and very good if you are just landed from Europe and the the after you got to drive to Key West like me.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay on the south side of Miami! Good value. :-)”
Reviews.Author: New_friends_GR
Reviews.Content: My significant other and I were on vacation visiting the Miami area in November 2011 and chose to stay at Hilton properties because we were redeeming Hilton Honors Rewards points. We purposely chose to stay in Miami and thought the Dadeland property gave us the most reward-point bang for our buck. It wasn't too hard to find the hotel off U.S. 1, and we were really close to the Dadeland Mall which we had a chance to visit. If you're staying at this hotel and you're driving toward downtown Miami, it's a nice easy drive. On the weekend we stayed there, the traffic lights on U.S. 1 are timed quite nicely for your drive getting to and from downtown. The check-in process was a breeze. Our room on the 4th floor was very nice, clean, and very comfortable. We love staying at Hamptons because the beds are so comfortable, and this particular Hampton was no exception. Breakfast was excellent... lots of good foods (hot and cold) to choose from: cheese omelets, make-your-own Belgian waffles, sausage, and then of course fresh fruit, yogurt, cereal, and so on. (The cheese omelets were amazing!) We loved the breakfast area because you could sit inside or outside... outside being particularly on a sunny Florida morning. This Hampton has an outdoor pool and hot tub, and we were able to take advantage of the hot tub one evening. Very nice pool area, although the main pool was a bit too chilly for us to use that night. Everything in the room worked well, and we were very satisfied. The check-out process was also very easy, and we would definitely enjoy staying there again if we ever have the chance. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Did not disappoint”
Reviews.Author: BahiaMakem
Reviews.Content: Two night stay. Cooked breakfast included. Room clean and comfortable (King). Helpful front desk. Good value for money in relation to the rest of Miami though a little away from the tourist areas, but is that bad thing? At least you have free car parking here!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay”
Reviews.Author: buktrvlr
Reviews.Content: I usually don't write reviews of franchise hotels, unless they stand out for soem reason, good or bad, I am writing this one to acknowledge the excellent service we received from the staff. On my way to the Keys for a fishing trip I lined up a half day peacock bass fishing trip in Miami. We stayed at this hotel and found it to be a great location for restaurants and also a mall. I can't comment on the mall because we only drove by. The front desk staff was very helpful in all ways and I would definitely stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Very well located for shopping and near to airport, nice breakfast”
Reviews.Author: HernanRestrepo
Reviews.Content: I recommend this hotel, have a very good relation between service / price. Clean, the people very friendly

Reviews.Title: “Our wedding weekend”
Reviews.Author: Chris H
Reviews.Content: We will never stay at another hotel in Miami. We found the service and cleanliness to be outstanding. Louis organized rooms for all of our friends and family coming into town for our wedding. Antonio was outstanding and the service from the staff was friendly and helpful. It helped make the best weekend of our lives so much more enjoyable and stress free. Many kudos to Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland. Price is only a concern in the absence of value and there is a great deal of value in staying at this hotel.-Chris and Lalita

Reviews.Title: “Excellent friendly service. Enjoyable stay!”
Reviews.Author: gypsyrunaway
Reviews.Content: Starting with pedros excellent, friendly front desk service in helping us locate the right room to the good breakfast, this Hampton is a reliable stay. Great location to shopping and nearby Venetian pool and biltmore hotel. The pool was the highlight of our stay and a must do if you're on the area!

Reviews.Title: “Based on my cost Very Good Value”
Reviews.Author: mathieuissa
Reviews.Content: With so many hotels in Miami and for the many shoppers who come to town to enjoy the malls, its tough to choose. I'd say however that the Hampton Inn "Dadeland Mall" is an ideal selection based on its location and price. The hotel is located a 2 minute drive from the mall which has numerous shops including JC PENNY, MACYS, SAKS 5th AVE etc. However, also nearby is the Dadeland Station which also has shopping, including Target, Bed Bath & Beyond, Best Buy. Rooms are spacious and clean and there has clearly been some renovation work done recently. My room 324 had a king size bed plus a pull out sofa and very large Philips LCD flat screen TV. There is the usual Hampton Inn basic breakfast and the staff are very professional. All in all if your base rate is no more than $80USD a nite its Great Value.

Reviews.Title: “They went our of their way to accommodate my family”
Reviews.Author: vouchergourmet
Reviews.Content: I stayed for two weeks, On my return from a vacation, I had to stay in Miami to work before going back home. The manager, Carlos went out of his way to made us feel at home. they gave me a larger room, a microwave and mini fridge at no extra cost. All the personnel was friendly and helpful to us, especially to my kids. Great breakfast and location.

Reviews.Title: “As usual, a great experience!”
Reviews.Author: Kelly M
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel several times. We make an annual trip of it and enjoy the great hospitality that all of the employees show us as well as the very comfortable and clean rooms. We'll certainly continue to put this hotel at the top of our list for traveling to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Couldnt Ask For Better Service”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer F
Reviews.Content: I stayed for a week at this hotel. The service was outstanding, especially Alfonso at the front desk. The breakfast was great and the attendants were also very nice and helpful. Everything was nice and clean. Couldnt have asked for a better place to stay. Will stay again!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: AnchorageAnne
Reviews.Content: Room was clean. Pool was clean. Breakfast was very good. The lady there kept refilling the items. There is a mall next door...you can walk to it. Very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and Convenient location”
Reviews.Author: TAD G
Reviews.Content: The reception staff at Hampton Inn Dadeland are superb. They are attentive to your needs and often very cooperative. I used the hotel shuttle to arrive to the hotel and the driver was very punctual and polite too. The rooms are small but very clean and comfortable bedding. The location is with in a walking distance to Dadeland Mall and other shopping facilities. Good breakfast before you go out for shopping. It has adequate parking space. Best value for your money...

Reviews.Title: “GREAT SERVICE!!!”
Reviews.Author: chavo1
Reviews.Content: We were in this hotel during 13 days. Great service, people very friendly Hector (the director), , Alfonso, Pedro, Fernando, Eylen, Antonio, Lylian, Eugenia, Virginia, Aleida...). The employes team is the key of the success oh this hotel. Good location and breakfast. We will be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Exception staff. A Miami Gem for Accomodation”
Reviews.Author: CRFan2
Reviews.Content: I have always enjoyed and favored the Hampton Inn's because of their amazing bedding. This particular location had the best overall service I have ever experienced in a chain hotel. All the staff, with no exceptions, were very positive, helpful and accomodationg. They made me feel like I was truly a "guest". I was there 6 nights so it is not an isolated shift. My compliments to the manager and his staff. Great breakfast, clean, hospitable, shuttle service and those great sheets! Great location for being near shopping and medical services. Walking distance to Miami Dada Mall and right on rail transit system.

Reviews.Title: “Hairy Bathroom”
Reviews.Author: FoodieMama
Reviews.Content: This hotel has a great location right next to Dadeland Mall and a big complex with a Target and Michael's nearby. My room was not what I normally expect from a Hampton Inn. On entering the room it looked like one bed had already been slept in. After closer inspection it was just a messy job of being made up but there were stains on the duvet, I slept in the other bed... which was not one of the nice big fluffy ones, but a bit more solid, the next thing that I noticed was the bathroom had long black hairs in the tub/shower, on the floor and stuck to the sink.....grossed me out. I was there 2 days and it never got better. I did tell the front desk . Would I stay there again...probably but I would request an inspection of the room first.

Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: TerezaHak
Reviews.Content: They picked up us on the airport and this servise was included, wow and also the same on the way back. The guy on the reception was nice and helpfull and room was nice with all the stuff which you need, every person which we met was friendly and always smilling. You need a car to get somewhere far but by bus you can be on the South beach Miami in hour, the metro-bus station is close and all the people in Miami nice. I can recommend is really good value for money. Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service will be returning!!!”
Reviews.Author: TK0721
Reviews.Content: My stay here was beyond exceptional; the staff was very eagered to help, especially Pedro & Alphonso they are great...& the staff was also prompt to responding on request for additional items e.g. towels & etc) I will definitely be returning for all my future stays in Miami...Another plus is it is also very close to Dadeland Mall & the public transit system if you don't rent a vehicle :-)

Reviews.Title: “It has been my only choice in Miami and will remain so.”
Reviews.Author: Sergio99
Reviews.Content: There are some great hotels and there are some hotels that are great, Difference ? on the first instance, size. The second you could name service, quality, comfort, location, cleanliness, right size, excel in management, right spot, easy to get there, cost benefit more then perfect. I've been there before a couple of times but as an executive I guess I regret sometimes not to show recognition of services that are rendered to me. I'm always on the run when travelling, but when in Miami I stretch my stay with Hampton. Why ? I feel at home, that's the prime condition for someone because of having to be always on the move, misses his family and city. The management excels and it's a hotel that smiles , metaphorically speaking..... I recomend.Try it and you will see why this evaluation. Sergio R Monteiro

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet, accommodating staff”
Reviews.Author: lli34678
Reviews.Content: I came to this Hampton Inn because I was having facial surgery at one of the medical facilities nearby. The location is fantastic for this purpose as it's very close to the hospital and many of the medical complexes. One of the best parts about this hotel is that they have a free shuttle service anywhere within 2 miles and free shuttle service from the airport to the hotel, so I was able to rely on them for transportation when I wasn't well enough yet to travel, and my companion was able to fly into Miami and accompany me during the surgery without having to deal with renting a car. The location is very near some good malls as well. The front desk help was courteous and responsive and especially understanding of my circumstances. They supplied both a microwave and refrigerator without a charge for my 7 day stay. The only caveat when staying in this area is that literally EVERYONE speaks Spanish as a first language and some things may get lost in translation when giving instructions.

Reviews.Title: “Filthy!”
Reviews.Author: RC1818
Reviews.Content: Stayed here one night on a business trip. This is what I found in my room: stained bedspread, flimsy side table with gum wads underneath its top; wall by desk was splashed with dirty water (or something). Gross! Called the front desk. Clerk was very nice (and apologetic) about it. Moved me to another room that was fine. However, I will not return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “It's not bad”
Reviews.Author: QuipQue
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel after passing by it a few times. The entrance is not very clearly indicated. This hotel is very very close to the Dadeland mall, a good thing for shoppers. There are also other shopping areas nearby. Staff was friendly. Rooms were on the small side. Free wi-fi and free breakfast, although we had to wait to sit: breakfast area was on the small side for such a big hotel and best not to arrive a few minutes before 10am, almost all the food will be gone and they do not restock. Breakfast was ok and there was anough choice. Just a warning for late sleepers :-) Coffee is available all day long in the lobby. Overall the hotel was ok.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: gord999
Reviews.Content: The location is very central. We stayed a couple of nights prior to cruising from Miami. The hotel is a short drive to downtown Miami, the Port, and Miami's south beach area. We also drove one day to Key West which was about 3 hrs one way. Very good shopping within a short walk of hotel. (Dadeland Mall) Hotel shuttle service is very convenient, we were taken to and from local restaurants in the evening. We would have been picked up at airport, and driven to the port had we not rented a car. Hotel staff were very good. Nice clean private outdoor pool with lots of lounge chairs and clean towels. Our only issue was with TV noise from an adjoining room. We first noticed it upon arrival one evening. The staff called and had the volume lowered. Then in the middle of the night, at about 03:00 we were awakened by the TV. Staff called the room, and then we heard staff pounding on the room door. It subsided for a while, then started up again. We stayed up from that point onward which made for a long day. I mentioned it at checkout, but nothing was said in return. This is why I rated the sleep quality as average. Following the trip, we received a note from the hotel GM Carlos Colloco asking us to rate our stay. I mentioned the incident, and were told we will be compensated for that night if we return. We plan to take Carlos up on his offer. We have rebooked at his hotel next March following our next cruise.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stopover for trip to the Keys”
Reviews.Author: dreamingofsun0607
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for just one night on our way to the Florida Keys and it was great! After a week spent over in the Naples area we wanted to break up the drive to Key West with a stopover somewhere near Miami and close to Highway 1 for an early getaway the next day. This hotel was ideal. Clean, comfortable and a great breakfast choice the next morning. It's not going to win any 'style' awards but it is everything you need in a hotel. We had a lovely welcome from the manager who invited us down for 'cookies' once we'd settled in and he offered advice on the area. As it turns out the hotel is around the corner from a massive shopping mall - so we went there in the evening and it has loads of 'classic American' stores and high end fashion as well as some cool places to eat. We're big fans of the Cheesecake Factory and so we ate there which was yum! All in all a really nice stay - I would have been more than happy to stay another few nights.

Reviews.Title: “Courteous employees, nice hotel, great amenities”
Reviews.Author: Vivian95
Reviews.Content: Though my stay was very short, it was very pleasant and I had no problems checking in or out. My room was very nice and clean and the people that work there were very courteous.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: choochoo71
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to let someone know that our stay was marvelous. We had a great time and enjoyed the time we spent with you all. We will definately recommend Hampton Dadeland to our friends. Everyone we encountered was friendly and helpful and the breakfast was surprisingly great. Thanks for making our stay a pleasurable experience.

Reviews.Title: “Adequate Hampton Inn with friendly, accomodating staff”
Reviews.Author: TravelerMR
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff are friendly and helpful. Ready to move a fridge in your room or recommend the best place to eat dinner. The room was equipped with two double beds and a coffee pot, but no microwave nor fridge. You can request a fridge and if they have one, they will bring it up. There is a microwave downstairs you can use. The breakfast was adequate. The staff worked hard to ensure items were refreshed and tables were wiped down. We ate at the end of the breakfast period and I was impressed the food choices were still being refreshed. The room was long and skinny - adequate for three people. The pool looked fine and the workout room was nice. It is fairly close to University of Miami, which is why we chose this Hampton. It was the lowest number of Hilton points and the front desk staff treated us well despite it being a free stay. Given the choices around University of Miami, I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Impressive for only a 2 star rating!”
Reviews.Author: wishboneWestSussex
Reviews.Content: Think of Premier Inn with a pool! The positives: free shuttle bus to airport and local shopping malls. Walking distance to Dadeland Shopping Mall, which has the biggest Macey's in USA.Clean and comfortable, quiet and far from the madding crowd! Pool also quiet, plenty of sunbeds to go round. Free internet access if you take a laptop. Helpful staff. Complimentary coffee and water whenever you want one and complimentary breakfast each morning, ice bucket and ice provided also complimentary. Negatives: pool small and not much character, not much around the hotel apart from the Mall. Very few restaurants within walking distance - Villagio's and Cheesecake Factory in Mall, but that's about it. Air conditioning noisy, no safe or robes or room service, no balconies so damp towels everywhere! We had booked out of the Fountainebleau so it was quite a culture shock! But much cheaper in everything from drinks to free transport.

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT gathering spot for family wedding”
Reviews.Author: perpetualvacationer
Reviews.Content: Last weekend several of my family members were in town for a wedding. While the wedding and reception were not held at the hotel, most of our family stayed there for the weekend. The rest of the family stayed in the Grove at about double the price. They had a nice time as well, but they paid double, breakfast was not included, had horrible traffic, it was noisy...BUT we...we had clean rooms, met for breakfast in the morning in the clean dining area (complimentary, mind you) AND we had a fabulous experience with a most accommodating front desk. My plane did not leave until late and I was so graciously given a late check out...subsequently, I laid out by the pool soaking up the last bits of sunshine before returning to a chilly DC. I would happily stay there again...the front desk was ALWAYS courteous and repeatedly reminded us if we needed ANYTHING to just ask. Thanks so much! (oh...and so conveniently located..walked across the street to get a pedi/mani at last moment)

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Sandimako
Reviews.Content: I've been coming here for years when I visited my sons at the University of Miami. I have always felt safe and welcomed, even when traveling alone. The little extras like fresh cookies and fruit snacks, a chocolate on my pillow, and the waffle maker at breakfast are great. The staff is very nice and the beds are super comfortable. What more could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: “Part of our group reservations were not honored at first”
Reviews.Author: wrilei1216
Reviews.Content: We arrived on a Friday evening with the confirmation document emailed from the Hampton Inn for our reservations, which were for two Non-Smoking King Study with Sofa Bed Room. The attendant told us that he had a reservation for only one room, despite my showing him the confirmation with the confirmation number printed on it. I had made the reservation through Booking.com, but did not bring that confirmation with me because I had not realized I would need it, as I had the confirmation from Hampton Inn. He said all the hotel had left remaining were smoking rooms, which were VERY smelly. He absolutely refused to accommodate us, despite the fact our reservations had been made on December 27, 2010 and I had called to confirm them with Hampton Inn. We had plans that evening, so I did not have an opportunity to look up my confirmation from Booking .com until late that night. When i did and took it down to the attendant, he "found" a non-smoking room and our traveling companions took it. He blamed me for the problem, saying I should have told him that our companions were staying in the room -- well, I reserved both rooms with my credit card and had one confirmation number for both, and obviously i wasn't staying in two rooms. I was furious. Then, it turned out the new room's floor was soaking wet. When they called they were told it was from the shower over-flowing. After all of this inconvenience, we all had a very poor sleep. The next morning, the room was changed. when i asked to speak to a manager, I was told none was available. I feel we should not be charged for our stay to make this right and demonstrate that the management takes it seriously and will not allow it to happen to others. It really marred what would otherwise have been a wonderful trip.

Reviews.Title: “Average all around.”
Reviews.Author: sitesea
Reviews.Content: This is an average Hampton Inn. It is clean, it has breakfast with cereal, toast, pastries, waffles and hot dishes. The hotel is maintained, but has a well used feel to it and the decor is a bit dated. The breakfast room is adequate and also has a screened patio for outside meals (the ashtrays on the tables kept us inside) There is a small pool and hot tub which has chaises and tables. This is better than the average parking lot pool- there is a courtyard for some privacy. The immediate location is strange- there is a mall nearby but the area is not very pedestrian friendly. Nearby there is a station to catch the Metrorail to travel into the city. During rush hour it is a jam to get anywhere but off hours it is pretty convenient to get into the city, or the airport, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Make a better choice if you can...”
Reviews.Author: Pianokar
Reviews.Content: Reservation with specific requirements was made 2 weeks in advance. When I arrived I was told my requirements could not be met as the hotel was full (I had a credit card secured reservation for 2 weeks). They could, however, give me a room with a refrigerator... but the phone was not working in that particular room. I made a really big fuss, as I had been driving nearly 4 hours, had food perishing in the car and needed to lay down in my reserved room. Within 5 minutes I was in a room and a refrigerator was delivered. When my husband tried to call that evening, nobody answered the hotel phone. He called my cell and I checked at the desk to see what was going on. Only one person was manning the desk and phone and there was nobody to assist him. With all the current modern technology, I would expect Hampton Inn and the umbrella organization to do much better, especially for the high price they charged. No guest should be put through the ringer like that. Twice! My last trip I stayed at a La Quinta qith absolutely no problems.

Reviews.Title: “a poor choice hampton inn!”
Reviews.Author: oakapplegal
Reviews.Content: stayed overnight before flying from MIA back to UK Were given a 2x double queen bed room, ground floor looking at car park postives: -free wifi -comfortable bed -free parking -free breakfast & hot drinks -location only 25 minutes drive from miami airport negatives: - reception staff very unfriendly, did not welcome us or tell us anything about the hotel amenities just checked us in and didnt even greet us with a hello!, good job we have stayed in hampton inns before and know about breakfast times etc. -rooms a bit shabby and need repainting -nice pool area and hot spa, but was not clean had a layer of scum lining the waters when we stayed, shame as a lovely sized pool and patio area -no guest laundry -overpriced, not usual hampton quality probably worst hampton ever stayed in would i stay here again? no thankyou

Reviews.Title: “Great alternative to pricey South Beach Hotels”
Reviews.Author: VA_travels60893
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel - great value. Nice alternative to pricey South Beach Hotels, especially when you condsider that you get free wi-fi parking and breakfast. Close to shopping, restaurants. Alfonso at the front desk was particularly welcoming, professional and helpful. Nice swimming pool, small workout room. Good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel. Period.”
Reviews.Author: Michiel72
Reviews.Content: Spending some time in Florida, we also took a trip to Miami. As this hotel was rated #2 we instantly booked a night there. Especially because we are very much in favour of hotels in the Hampton Inn-chain. The hotel was nice, but is remote from the city centre. That has advantages, as it is perfect to get there by car, it has a free parking lot and you can enjoy the rest of a suburb. The room we had was ok, not much more than that. The interior of the bathroom seems outdated; however everything did work.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, but far from U of M”
Reviews.Author: ediblesprysky
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I just stayed here for four days while attending a conference at the University of Miami Frost School of Music. It was a very nice place--everything was clean, the breakfast was really good for free hotel food, and the staff was accommodating. They couldn't fit us in the shuttle from the airport, so they paid for our cab. And the sleep we got there was absolutely fantastic. The location is way less convenient than it sounds. It's located two metro stops south of the campus, which sounds good in theory, but doesn't really work in practice. Being a pedestrian in this area of Miami is difficult, to say the least. Sidewalks end unexpectedly, there are few crosswalks, and motorists are rude. Even getting to the metro stop from the hotel requires walking through grass and jaywalking. Once we got to the U of M campus stop, we had to walk back the way we came almost half the distance to another station, and then halfway across the campus. We ended up walking several miles every day. Great exercise, but not as convenient as I'd have liked. This place is really nice, but if you're staying here for an event at the University, I would definitely recommend renting a car!

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, comfortable”
Reviews.Author: dkckekmk
Reviews.Content: My son and I stayed here on a college visit to the University of Miami. It was clean, quiet, comfortable, and conveniently located.

Reviews.Title: “Friendliest Staff Ever”
Reviews.Author: tazzie29
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here on several occassions and have always enjoyed my stay. Staff is very friendly, helpful, clean rooms, and of course very quiet. Service is great. Great location near malls, shops, restaurants. Also enjoy the buffet breakfast. Highly recommend staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, service and location!”
Reviews.Author: Sailorgal
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were planning a holiday shopping to Dadeland and found this Hampton Inn at Dadeland. We were going to be a little late due to traffic and called the hotel to let them know. Carlos was very friendly and chipper and said no problem! Dadeland Mall is only a few blocks away and other stores like Sports Authority, Best Buy, Michaels and Super Target are even closer. So the location for shopping was ideal. The hotel room (king with sofa) was clean (no worries about bedbugs!) and the service great. The breakfast was a pleasant surpise with waffles, eggs and sausage/canadian bacon along with juices, coffees/teas, pastries and cereals. So if you're looking for small hotel that's clean with friendly staff and is close to shopping, this is a great choice! And it has a free wi-fi and a fitness room to boot!

Reviews.Title: “Personal service is great!”
Reviews.Author: Jools_DevonUK
Reviews.Content: Recognized me from last year and greeted us like friends. Will make this our regular hotel for any stay in Miami Great for cruise lines - Hotel organize a shuttle - or subsidize a taxi

Reviews.Title: “Perfect...no problem, no hassle, everyone nice and pleasant.”
Reviews.Author: rayallen2
Reviews.Content: I was born in Miami, and when I return to my hometown, I've found the Hampton Dadeland the best place. The location is good for me, since I know the town, and also the mall nearby is great. I always use it to shop between outings. Loads of restaurants nearby, best of all Big Cheese, the low priced Italian restaurant which I've enjoyed for years. Best of all the rates are great for Miami, and everyone is helpful and friendly. Also, I've found this one better than other Hamptons in Miami. I love Hampton Inns, and anyone who likes them as I do will love this one.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff Great Location”
Reviews.Author: LesliF
Reviews.Content: We wanted to see South Beach as well as the Keys before leaving on our cruise vacation. The Dadeland location was perfect. The hotel was also a SUPER value and the staff was VERY VERY accommodating. We were able to check in early after a very long flight and they had great recommendations for restaurants that only locals seemed to know about. We will absolutely be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic service, vibe, value!”
Reviews.Author: Americana_Mama
Reviews.Content: Husband & I stayed at the Hampton Inn Miami/Dadeland the night before our cruise out of the port of Miami. It was conveniently located next to the Dadeland Mall and adjacent "downtown" area. We were warmly greeted by the manager, Alfonso, who quickly checked us in and chatted with us about our band back in Detroit. He was super attentive, arranging for the shuttle to take us to dinner at a great local Cuban restaurant. We had initially kicked around taking the train in to South Bch, but he warned us that it wouldn't be a great idea in the evening. I appreciated his concern for our safety as we had never been to Miami before. He suggested some local music venues, should we want to catch a show and made sure we had transportation to and fro. In the evening, there were freshly baked cookies for the hotel guest. A nice little touch! The hotel was extremely clean, good sized rooms, and the staff was also attentive and pleasant. In the morning there was a breakfast spread that was fresh and had a variety of foods to choose from. After eating, we went to check out the pool and have a swim before checking out. It was clean and cared for and ample amount towels were available.A staff person stuck her head out the back door and asked a guest if he'd like more coffee, which I thought was super thoughtful. Talk about going the extra mile! At check out, Alfonso informed us that because the shuttle van company had not negotiated the toll fees with the Port of Miami, the hotel would charge us half the original price of the stay in light of having to take a cab. That was a nice touch, considering the cost of a taxi was crazy. Overall, a wonderful stay and I'd highly recommend this hotel. No bed bugs...only pleasant sleep and attentive staff.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Helpful Staff & Clean Rooms”
Reviews.Author: love2sun12
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night October 31st before departing for a cruise. Shuttle service from airport to hotel was great and so was the service the next day to the port! Staff was very friendly (all who we encountered October 31st) and went above and beyond to assist us with luggage, questions we had, and so on! Very helpful staff! That alone makes a stay great! Clean room - room was a bit small. Would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: Corinna2711
Reviews.Content: This was the second time i stayed in this hotel and it once again did not disappoint. the location is perfect for shopping (literally 1 min from Dadeland Mall, Target, Best Buy etc) and eating out. The staff was super helpful, friendly and accommodating esp Alfonso helped us out a lot. The breakfast was good, free parking, free internet and all for an excellent room rate! no complaints about the hotel and i would definitely stay here again AND recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad...”
Reviews.Author: Love2travel2222
Reviews.Content: Service and breakfast ok.It needs more maintenance hallways and rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: Cookenstein
Reviews.Content: While the title is slightly exaggerated, the stays are certainly as comfortable as business class hotels can be. You are greeted professionally, and I personally recommend the front desk folks for going out of their way for me, on several occasions, when having trouble in their business office ( a service provided for guests) with one of their computers, the front desk agent in charge promptly took me to the front desk offices to allow me to use one of their computers ( signed in as a guest of course) to quickly print my boarding passes. It saved me time, and was an over the top move. I like this hotel, and actually prefer the first floor to the others (if anyone's reading :) ) the accommodations are pretty much all one needs for business trips for several days or overnight. Comfortable, professional, convenient.

Reviews.Title: “EVERYTHING WAS PERFECT!”
Reviews.Author: detailkingdes
Reviews.Content: A fantastic hotel! Everything was perfect in all areas from the staff to the swimming pool&hot-tub! Highly recommend this hotel to everyone!!!

Reviews.Title: “THIS PLACE WAS GREAT”
Reviews.Author: pilot2643
Reviews.Content: I can see why the reviews for this location are so good. This property is clean and quiet (no road noise) and in a convenient location just off US 1 in Dadeland. Desk staff was some of the best we have experienced, and extreemly friendly and informative. Housekeeping staff throughout our stay was very courtious and helpful. Beds especially were very comfortable The breakfast was good and the staff working in the morning wanted you to be comfortable. (I've never had someone say "eat more, eat more, its good") It was obvious to us that they value the guest and we appreciated it.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it, would happily go back.”
Reviews.Author: longsands
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were collected from Miami Int. ariport by the courtesy bus which is a Godsend. Being strangers in a foreign land, having a local preson drive you straight to the hotel eliminates a lot of stress. The reception process was made so simple by the helpful and most informative Alfonso. In fact all of the front desk staff were first class and coundn't do enough for us. Our room was spacious and clean and the bed is one of the most comforable I have ever slept in. The room amenities include: flat screen TV, clock radio, hair drier, iron and ironing-board, coffee filter machine and plenty of hanging and storage room. The complimentary breakfast is a very welcome touch, sets you up nicely for the day ahead. We put the free wi-fi and internet cafe to good use during our stay. Other hotel amenities include: swimmimg pool and hot spa, gymnasium and business centre. If you don't fancy driving in a strange city, I would recommend using the Metro-rail which is very close by and gives access to most of Miami. Buy a weekly pass for $26 to get unlimited travel on the Metrorail, Metromover( a monorail system which covers downtown Miami) and all Metro buses. Dadeland mall is a short walk away but we found it to be a bit on the upmarket side. This was bourn out by the fact that the mall walkways were packed but the shops were empty. To summarise, we would be more than happy to spend more time at this hotel and it's wonderful staff. One observation, this hotel needs a bar. Other than the mall, nothing is in walking distance. After a long day of shopping and sightseeing it would be nice to relax with the other guests and share experiences.

Reviews.Title: “The hospitality and service was excellent.”
Reviews.Author: Therese32
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time due to the commitment and dedication of the staff. From Linda and Ann

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great price, great location”
Reviews.Author: LilianaK
Reviews.Content: I had the opportunity to stay at the Hampton Inn in Dadeland with my family, and I found one of the best hotels that I have ever been. A list of things that I like about this hotel: 1. The nice people at the front desk: they are always kind and helpful. 2. Efficiency: despite the fact that the hotel was almost full, you never see a line of people at the front desk. Checking in and checking out is fast. Everything that my family and I needed was quickly satisfied (more towels, a fridge in the room, etc.). 3. Quality: the rooms have the perfect size, and the beds are just wonderful. 4. Cleaning: as a woman, I pay special attention to this issue. Cleaning at this hotel is perfect. 5. Excellent prices: with all these characteristics you would expect expensive rates, however we've got an excellent price for our stay. 6. Humanity: the hotel staff try to make you feel always comfortable, for example when you arrive to the hotel after many hours of flying. 7. Location: it is just one block from the shopings and from one of the Miami metrorail stations. The hotel has a vehicle that picks you up from the airport. With all these characteristics my family decided to use this hotel everytime that we will go to Miami. We had a wonderful experience there.

Reviews.Title: “Stay at your own risk!!! no security-no responsibiity”
Reviews.Author: Danscar
Reviews.Content: DIsaster--avoid this hotel!! This past Friday night our car and the cars of five other guests were vandalized at this hotel. We were parked in the front and it someone used a baseball bat to bash in our car. Another family had all of daughter's college things in the car and they lost it all. The hotel is not at all responsible so who cares if they are nice as it says on this site. We received no phnoe calls from the managers etc and are now stuck with a costly repair bill for our car and lost our GPS and other costly items. and suffered terrible inconvenience losing the whole morning with the police. A sign (in the dark )to park at your own risk is not what you expect from a Hampton Inn with great ratings in a nice area. Where else are you expected to park if not in the hotel lot?? The police say it happens in their lot alot. Also I called the front desk at 4 am and no one answered. Someone might have been sleeping on the job when the robberies occurred. One front desk person said they used to have a sign when you check in as warning. We wished we were warned.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location and service”
Reviews.Author: mummy666
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn, Dadeland for 3 nights in Aug. This was myself, husband and two kids (12 and 15). Alfonso, the consierge, was extremely helpful and friendly, and deserves a mention for his helpful and knowledgable manner. The room was great, two double beds, lots of pillows, comfy beds, the bathroom was clean and the usual towels and shampoos etc. The housekeeping staff were efficient and helpful. The location of the hotel is good for what we wanted, access into Miami itself and also to Little Havana. Dadeland Mall is very close but is not what we expected - high end spenders will love it, those of us wanting more discount stores won't. The breakfasts varied, great the first day, not the second and better again on the third - but not as much choice as on the first day. Perhaps different housekeeping staff prepare on different days, that would explain the disparity between the choices for breakfast. Pool is great, quite large and very quiet. My son used the gym - needless to say the rest of us didn't!

Reviews.Title: “almost perfect hotel”
Reviews.Author: abigails_owner
Reviews.Content: This hotel has it all: clean rooms; comfortable beds; pool and spa; exercise room; computer room with high-speed Internet access; shuttle to/from the airport; and a GREAT hot breakfast with a cornucopia of choices. In addition, the staff couldn't be more helpful or friendly. We were in Miami for my uncle's 100th birthday celebration, and stayed at this hotel for 3 days at the beginning of the week, and then two more days at the end of the week, with some travel to the Keys in between. I could happily live here permanently!

Reviews.Title: “A Good Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: grrprr
Reviews.Content: Having stayed at many Hampton Inns over the years, I was not overly surprised by what I found. They had a modern look, feel and comfort. Our room did not have a working phone, but we were told that upfront. They are apparently updating the system. We did have one of the few rooms with a microwave and refridgerator. The beds were great and the room was extremely quiet. It would have been nice to have a few more channel options on the cable, if not also the real "local on the 8's".

Reviews.Title: “Really Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kw09
Reviews.Content: Chose this hotel b/c of the other reviews and was not disappointed. super friendly staff at the front desk. room was very nice, beds as always for Hilton Chains were wonderful. the pool was large and we also enjoyed the hot tub. location was great - just a couple blocks from the Dadeland Mall. We would definitely return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “This is the Hotel / Hampton to stay at in Miami”
Reviews.Author: Qwaz
Reviews.Content: Definitely ready to return next trip to Miami. There are multiple hotels and Hamptons in Miami, by far this is the best hotel and Hampton in Miami we have experienced so far. We actually cancelled our reservations we had from another hotel as we were reading hotel reviews traveling from Georgia to Miami. The other hotel chain had terrible reviews and then we read Hampton Dadeland, we were convinced. All the Hampton Dadeland reviews are true. We had two different families, ten total traveling together prior to our cruise. The kids were ages 12-17. We required rooms for the overnight with a late night arrival. Front Desk was awesome, other staff exceptional, all friendly AND helpful. This is the place to stay for overall cost, cleanliness, service, amenities and physical location. We were sure to pocket their business cards as we canâ€™t wait to stay here again. Transportation arrangements through front desk were easy, quick and significantly better on all fronts than other hotels we have stayed at in Miami. Only 20 minutes from peer or airport, it is not an issue, this hotels transportation is great and I defy anyone who can find a better deal. Plenty of food and stores in the general area. Food can easily be delivered as the kids swam in the pool when we had a late night dinner pizzaâ€™s delivered from â€œBig Cheese of Miamiâ€� recommended by the front desk. We were not disappointed. Complimentary breakfast was what we expected and fully satisfying. You wonâ€™t be disappointed. If you have any questions or needs, talk to the gents at the front desk (Alfonzo) and if they can make it happen for you they will! Thank You Hampton Dadeland Miami, you started our vacation off on the right foot.

Reviews.Title: “Understanding and Consideration”
Reviews.Author: Bark096
Reviews.Content: Recently we stayed at the Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland which is a clean and efficiently run hotel with friendly staff. I was recovering from a hernia operation and Pedro at the reception desk allowed us a late check-out to 4:30 pm which we greatly appreciated. This allowed us to watch the World Cup final in our room and leave immediately thereafter for the airport for an international flight home. There was no attitude and simply understanding.

Reviews.Title: “WELL LOCATED”
Reviews.Author: OSCALGOR
Reviews.Content: My wife and I went to Miami last february and we wanted to stay close to the mall and stores. This is the reason we booked this hotel. The hotel is comfortable and clean. They provide complementary transportation to some malls and to the airport upon request. Also they have complementary hot breakfast. Nearby, restaurants, Dadeland mall and somo other stores. For a couple of nights is a very good option if you are going shopping to miami.

Reviews.Title: “exceptional”
Reviews.Author: dennycrane_10
Reviews.Content: The customer service at the Hampton was outstanding.The shuttle driver and the nighttime reception desk clerk were sincere,real,compassiont. I was visiting Dadeland to have surgery at the Hernia Clinic of Miami. The room service was great. We had wakeup calls promptly, extra bath amenities provided and the cleanliness was exceptional. There is nothing I could say negatively about our stay, except that it was to short of a stay. I will be sending an email to Hampton.com to personnaly recognize two of the Inns employees for outstanding service. I highly recommend anyone who travels to the city of Dadeland to stay with the folks at thisHampton Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Alphonso at the Front Desk makes the Stay Special”
Reviews.Author: EvanOwen62
Reviews.Content: Good location for shopping and activities in southern Miami. This hotel is a great value but it is the staff that makes this hotel really shine. Most of my contact with the staff was with the afternoon manager Alphonso T. He is the embodiment of customer service. We are just a regular family, but he made us feel like VIPs. Other pricier hotels should take a lesson from him.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice room and wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: ReviewReadingMom
Reviews.Content: Had no problems with this hotel. Property and room was very clean and well kept. Free breakfast in the morning always helps and had many great tasing options. Staff made me feel welcome and always greeted me when I walked past. Will stay again when I'm in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for me in this area”
Reviews.Author: EasyEd12
Reviews.Content: My daughter being at a college in Miami brings me to this area a couple times a year. Have stayed at other hotels (all closer to campus), but this offers better combination of easy access to campus and good value (I am not in the area for beach or other recreation or entertainment). Have stayed at this hotel several times. Staff at this hotel is very capable, competent and friendly -- especially Alfonso at the front desk.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel, team members and good services at a very smart price.”
Reviews.Author: josepscosta
Reviews.Content: I have been in this hotel for the last three years and every yaer it is better. The team members are fantastic and ready tohelp every time, day and nigth. The manager, Antonio, is always aware of everything and available to provide all your needs. The facilities are always kept clean, the location is extremely convenient, the breakfast is very good and have confortable rooms. On our next vacations we, my wifw and me, will be there again. I highly recomend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff”
Reviews.Author: LattechaMontegoBay
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland from May 5 to 8, 2010, and was pleased at the warm hospitality of most of the employees. Alfonso, who worked the Front Desk in the evenings was particularly pleasant and helpful in every way. Often as is the case when rooms are simple and service is limited, it is the employees that make a property stand out. Alfonso is definitely one of those stars that one remembers long after the stay ends. As well, the older gentleman who drove the shuttle on Saturday evening (May 8) deserves a commendation. He was sweet and very engaging. The only downside to this visit was the shuttle. One understands that this is a complimentary service and that it is offered on a first come first serve basis but it must be possible to coordinate services so guests do not spend an hour waiting for it to arrive. All in all a good trip. I would return, but would definitely plan on NOT using the shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “Great business Hotel in Miami”
Reviews.Author: Carlosp20
Reviews.Content: This was my 3rd time in Miami while on business and the hampton Inn Dadeland is Hospitality at its best. the front desk staff makes you feel welcomed and the rest of the staff including the managers, who were always around to greet me and concerned asking me if my stay was a pleasant one. This is one hotel that i will recommend, and look forward to my next stay there.

Reviews.Title: “high standard of hotel and service”
Reviews.Author: derekwLondon
Reviews.Content: close to the airport and close enough to easily get to Miami and its attractions. As usual this chain provides good quality rooms and the public areas are clean and well maintained. The breakfast buffet offers a wide selection and is always being restocked. A nice touch are the cookies on reception in the evening and the option of a breakfast bag for those who need a quick getaway. The friendly and very efficient receptionists give a warm welcome and good impression. The Hotel is close to the mall and lots of the chain restaurants so plenty of choice. I would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: AU-GNV-FL
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one weekend night while on a family trip. Hotel is quiet and set back off the major roads but is close to many places. You could walk to two malls and the Metro Rail station in less than 5 minutes. Metro Rail can get you downtown and to Bayside in a half hour without the aggravations of traffic/parking. Numerous stores and restaurants in area. Nice hot/cold breakfast in the morning. Fresh baked cookies and newspapers always available for free in the lobby. Large flat screen tv in room with numerous movie and sports channels. Hotel is in a safe area of Miami. If driving in from the north or airport exit SR 826 on to Sunset Drive and come in the back way. Will save you 10 minutes as you miss all the mall/Kendall Drive traffic.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hospitality from Front Desk to Shuttle Drivers”
Reviews.Author: mtrPeru
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel before and after my cruise and the hotel kept the car for free while cruising. During my two medical check-up, I was driven and picked-up from all my appointments, droved to the malls and shopping centers, and--most importantly--helped in every aspect of my stay by the wonderful staff. Could improve the phone service (takes several rings for incoming calls to get through). The hot breakfast includes fruits, juices, eggs, pancakes, yoghurt, breads and muffins. You have coffee and tea all day, free apples in the counter most of the day and warm cookies in the afternoons. The rooms are clean, house keeping staff very friendly and efficient. Would recommend to get a room on the first floor with a refrigerator and microwave. The business center needs improvement with a printer. Highly recommended for shopping in Dadeland Mall.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service, friendly staff and relaxing place to stay. 10+”
Reviews.Author: cgallegos
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay whether traveling alone or with your family. Alfonso, Pedro, Carlos and all of the staff made us feel so welcome. They took care of us during our stay by making sure we had a good breakfast, our rooms were comfortable, we had someplace to eat for dinner and fresh hot baked cookies when we arrived after work. They went above and beyond their jobs and not just for us but with all customers.

Reviews.Title: “BEST NIGHTS REST EVER!”
Reviews.Author: detailkingdes
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in my opinion the best managed hotel in Florida! I travel all over and everytime I stay at this hotel, I always get the best nights rest!!!!!!! Everyone is polite-the hotel is very clean-great pool&hot-tub and love the soft cotton bed comforters!!!! I highly recommend this hotel! A 10++++++ rating!

Reviews.Title: “One to remember for next time!”
Reviews.Author: MichiganMom3
Reviews.Content: Every other year we cruise out of Miami. Our main vacation is the cruise so the amenities we look for in a hotel include low cost, clean sheets, and transportation from the Miami Airport and to the Miami cruise port. This hotel exceeds those requirements and is our new hotel of choice for our pre-cruise / post cruise stays. The hotel is across the street from the Miami Metro rail. For a few bucks you can ride all day and see things like Bayside Market place, Dadeland mall, Sunset mall, Miami zoo, Miami museum of art etc. Too many things to name. The transfer to the cruise port and airport are easy and efficent. The room is clean and comfortable. The pool area is enclosed, clean, has plenty of chairs and a hot tub area. (My teens spent hours in the pool and hot tub). The complimentary breakfast included: cheese omlets, muffins, donuts, bagels, fresh fruit, buscuits, cereal, coffees, teas, juices, etc. It was much more then we expected (and tastier too). We will go back for sure and I have already shared this infor with my fellow cruise enthusiasts! Within walking distance there is a Tony Romas resturant. I recommend this for Rib lovers!

Reviews.Title: “No windows to open, poor breakfast, too much carpet”
Reviews.Author: MarceloFenoll
Reviews.Content: pros - price - location - some guys speaks portuguese - good towels - big room - free parking cons - room's window don't open, only noisely A/C - terrible breakfast - only plastic tableware - too much carpet (alergic!) - no frig in room

Reviews.Title: “Great stay Very refreshing”
Reviews.Author: Javidavi
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hampton Inn Dadeland this past week for 1 night and I was really impressed here is a nice hotel in the South Miami area with a great staff that is friendly, and goes out of their way to make your stay a pleasurable one I will highly recommend this hotel to my friends and co-workers Breakfast was very good and plenty of varieties.

Reviews.Title: “exceptable for one night”
Reviews.Author: jacobfuller23
Reviews.Content: my rating to this hotel is 3,5 from 5. if you are just looking a bed to sleep, you can stay in Hampton without thinking. Do not except more from here. Also they have good rooms for that money.

Reviews.Title: “What a great stay!”
Reviews.Author: rc218
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were in Miami, Feb 24, 2010 one night pre-cruise. We decided to stay at this Hampton Inn because of it's proximity to dining and shopping. I'm so glad we did. They have a free shuttle to and from the airport. They also dropped us off at the Cheesecake Factory(about a mile from the hotel) for dinner at no charge. They charged $15.00 per room to take us to the port to catch our cruise. That is a HUGE savings if traveling with kids. I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a nice place to stay before a cruise. It definately met our needs.

Reviews.Title: “Decent.”
Reviews.Author: BluDragonFlyer
Reviews.Content: Stayed two nights. PROS: -Hampton beds & linens (fitted sheets, clean duvette cover) -quiet location & room -clean & maintained facility -bathrooms maintained (not new) -next to Dadeland Mall (very big shooping mall, Saks, Nordstroms etc.) -best featrue is price$$ CONS: -hard to find -furniture is used and fabric on chairs, cushions stained -it is is south Miami and if you are going to Maimi Beach be prepared to drive

Reviews.Title: “Out by Mall- Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: happytraveller0123
Reviews.Content: We needed a decent place to stay for one night- its about 20 min from downtown near a mall, but it's a straight shot down the highway and this place is very very clean, fairly new hotel, comfortable, great breakfast and there are some great little restaurants in strip malls nearby. A fantastic Vietnamese place called Miss Saigon Bistro up the street.

Reviews.Title: “A most relaxing and attentive experience”
Reviews.Author: SchatzieDear
Reviews.Content: The service we received was excellent. Staff continually asked if they could do anything for us. Received call to room from management making sure I liked the room. Room was extremely nice and had a new look overall. Plenty of towels, exercise room and pool area were very good. Total experience was superior. The chocolate chip cookies were good also!

Reviews.Title: “Very good experience with Dadeland Hampton Inn.”
Reviews.Author: SeashellWrangler
Reviews.Content: This particular stay was very good. Last time I stayed here (2 years ago), I was not happy at all. This time, the employees were extremely helpful, from front desk to housekeeping, and the lady that puts out the breakfast food in the morning. The room was clean and spacious, bathroom was worn but clean with lots of towels and amenities. I felt welcomed and that my business was appreciated. What an improvement. It seems there was a wider variety of food for the breakfast buffet as well. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms - average service”
Reviews.Author: Jamaicanyardie
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel because of a shopping package that they promoted on their site. It should have included a bag, coupon book, meal and shuttle to Dolphin Mall. Clerk who checked us in told us that the shuttle treated the airport as priority so we could get to the mall if it wasn't busy with the airport. Eventually we were able to get the shuttle when we needed it but we were turned off by his flippant response to something that they specifically promote. The other items in the package are not particularly valuable so next time around I would not pick the package. We liked the room which has very comfortable beds and lots of space. The room included a free breakfast and when we got downstairs they had run out of everything and there were several of us guests just waiting around. Eventually they did replenish but it took a little while and it was obvious that they weren't paying attention.

Reviews.Title: “Service - Service - Service”
Reviews.Author: CTWalter
Reviews.Content: Service was great. Staff helped with how to get places, suggesting places to go and how to get there. Room was very clean, nice size, furniture was in very good condition all the necessities - pool, frig, hair dryer, etc. Good location, near shopping, sites, near train- free pickup from airport nominal fee to cruise port. Liked best that they took the time to help you when you needed it.

Reviews.Title: “We had a fantastic stay at Hampton Miami Dadeland”
Reviews.Author: GAUCHAPortoAlegre_rs
Reviews.Content: We recomend this hotel because the staff is very kind. The room is clean and the breakfast is delicius. We reallly feel at home.

Reviews.Title: “Quite good family staing hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sathler
Reviews.Content: I would like to share the good experience in staying at Hamton Inn Dadeland! Quite good place, nice rooms and good to stay with your family!!

Reviews.Title: “This is the Place to Stay in the Miami Area.”
Reviews.Author: Tripin08
Reviews.Content: My partner and I had a very enjoyable, uneventful stay at this very clean comfortable quiet hotel. All that we could have asked for on our trip to visit friends in that area of Miami. We also found it an excellent location for all the sites and areas of Miami. A breeze getting in and out as it is right near highway and US1. Cant wait to go back to Miami and stay at this Hampton Inn again.

Reviews.Title: “They should all be this good!”
Reviews.Author: radiolouis
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Hampton Inn Dadeland several times in the last two years and this is my first review. I love this clean, super friendly property and I consider it a jewel among Miami hotels. The location is awesome, the beds and decor are brand new, and the staff is ready to meet your every need. This is a super priced hotel when you need 4 star sleeping/room appointments at a great price. The pool area is wonderful and the jacuzzi is awesome for an evening soak. I can't believe how nice the pool is , fresh towels and everything from the front desk! The best restaurants in town deliver here so who needs room service? The Big Cheese is my Miami late night munchie place. This is my fav in Miami and I know them all!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel,Great Price”
Reviews.Author: Marney2
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Hampton Inn Dadeland on numerous occasions since my daughter goes to school at the University of Miami. It is convenient to everything, the malls, the beaches, restaurants and the university. MIA is a 15 minute ride away. The room are spotless, the service is always great and friendly.And they throw in a hot breakfast from6 am to 10:30 am. There is a nice pool and hot tub. Coffeee is always good! Great beds and bedding!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Service!!”
Reviews.Author: pedidik
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this hotel due to a family emergency. The staff was very accomdating, we never knew from day to day how long we would need to stay and they were very accomodating to our needs. The rroms were very comfortable, and the breakfast was always great. I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and great personnal”
Reviews.Author: lmychal
Reviews.Content: I spend over 200 nights a year on the road and in hotels. i have stayed at the Ritz and this hotel staff are just as good. great rates, the rooms are large and spotless. good breakfast buffet and always yes for anyone who works there. Location works fine and easy to get back and forth from and to... did I metion te hotel staff, they handled every request put to them!

Reviews.Title: “Nicest environment away from home”
Reviews.Author: granny601
Reviews.Content: My family and I were in Miami so our husbands could attend a Catholic Retreat nearby the hotel. We were treated especially kind when I asked for a time extension of several hours beyond check-out time. The staff was so courteous and accomodating. We had four young children with us, and the ability to stay in a hotel was a true blessing. Also, my grandchildren and I have allergies, and the staff went out of its way to get us into a completely non-smoking floor and rooms. We travel all over, and this hotel is by far, one of the best we've ever been to.

Reviews.Title: “Most accommodating hotel I have ever visited”
Reviews.Author: C0mmish
Reviews.Content: Carlos went beyond the call of duty to accommodate us. Rooms were neat, clean, roomy & quiet. They shuttled us to Port and responded very promptly to our request to be picked up upon our return. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: BritJus
Reviews.Content: There are so many good things i can say about this hotel. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly to say the least and made our stay extremely enjoyable. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable (was much better than i expected). The complimentary breakfast was always great and there was much variety as compared to a normal continental breakfast. The location of this hotel was better than we had expected. We mainly wanted to shop and do a little touristy things such as the zoo which was close by and dadeland mall within walking distance was great. There are many restaurants close by that you could walk to but the hotel shuttle was a life saver. Since many shopping areas were nearby it really cut down on the money you would spend in taxi if you didn't want to rent a car. The shuttle was always available and was very convenient and the drivers knew South Miami very well and were able to direct us in different places to go! I would advise anyone going to the dadeland area to stay at this hotel. It really made our stay that much more enjoyable at an extremely affordable rate!

Reviews.Title: “typical Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: roadtripper10
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night on business. Very typical Hampton Inn- which is a good thing to not get any surprises. Work out room qute small, but everything appeared to be working. outdoor pool and hot tub looked clean, but closed at 9 (later would be nicer!). Front desk staff very friendly and helpful. Internet worked well. Bathroom well stocked with shampoo etc (two of everything). Room was 100% typical Hampton inn- clean and comfortable- I didn't think it was worn as others have commented. Sort of hard to find- tucked way back, but easy to find lots of places to eat being next to a mall.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: joeric6i2
Reviews.Content: i went for my friends wedding and i was very happy with the service and staff of this hotel.this hotel very clean and very well maintainedand very convenient next to the dadeland mall.the staff was very helpful and went out of their way to make my stay a more plesant one. i would highly reccommed this property. Thank u maria rosado

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay with reasonable rates”
Reviews.Author: Yodee
Reviews.Content: We stayed 6 nights this month at the Hampton Inn. Everything was pretty great. The rooms were excellent- large & comfortable. We had a King and paid $161 a night with free parking. Not cheap, but not terrible for a nice place. We do feel like we got our money's worth. High-speed internet in rooms, worked pretty well while we were there. Did not use the pool, but it looked nice. It's definitely much smaller than it looks on their website. Only 'complaint' is that the "Fitness Room" was kind of pathetic. (That's important to me when I book a hotel). There were 3 pieces of equipment...a treadmill, an exercise bike & an eliptical, all of which were OK. That's it. No free weights, no remote for the TV & no way to reach to change channel. And the worse thing in there? A SCALE!! Geez.... Breakfast was nice- plentiful actually. Cereals, oatmeal, muffins, pastries, toast, bagels with creamcheese. On the 2 times we ate there, hot choices were waffles + sausages and Cheese omelets. Location- We don't know Miami very well, but the hotel is located right near some freeway entrances, Highway 1 and is behind a big shopping mall with a Target, Michael's Art Supplies, a Subway sandwich place, Best Buy, Sports Authority. Nearby are major dept. stores like Macy's, Sax 5th Ave. All in all, a great and comfortable stay. Highly recommended...

Reviews.Title: “Number 14 in Miami???”
Reviews.Author: AmySRQ
Reviews.Content: This place was completely ordinary, right down the the well-worn rooms. Why this shows up at #14 in Miami is a complete mystery to me. Room was pretty beat up, though relatively clean. Check in staff was very friendly, but the warnings about car safety were disconcerting. When our key card ceased to function, another staff member fixed the card for us, but without asking for any ID...just took the room-number and reprogrammed the card. We could have told her any room number and she would just have given us a key. Not so great. Location was pretty bad...wedged between a highway and a mall. Many confusing highways all around....tough to get going in the right direction.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and staff, but Hampton's reservations were a problem”
Reviews.Author: CenTxVanDriver
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights at the Hampton Inn / Dadeland over a weekend. There were an overwhelming number of positives for this hotel. Most of all and first of all, the staff were professional friendly, and eager to ensure our stay was a pleasant experience. The room and common areas were clean, and there was no chemical odor from cleaners or disinfectants. The beds were fairly comfortable, even the fold-out couch I slept on. Despite a full hotel, all the guests were quiet, and we never had a problem with noise or really any sounds from other guests. Problems were few... we were on the 4th floor and the wireless internet service was spotty. The connection dropped almost as soon as it was made. The staff tried to help but it may have been a problem with our location in the building. Had this been a business trip, I would have requested a room closer to the lobby for better wireless service. Another thing was a misreporting of available space by the Hampton Inn website. Hamptonnn.hilton.com consistently told us that for the few nights we were there, the hotel had at least one nonsmoking room with two doubles available, when in fact the hotel had no such rooms open. We accepted a room with a king bed and a fold-out sofa. The staff were very apologetic about the repeated error, and I don't fault them at all - it's clearly a problem with Hampton/Hilton's online reservation system. One last positive from a very negative situation we had. My wife had a very sudden and very unexpected medical emergency at 345am the last night of our stay there. After I ensured she was stable, I phoned the front desk in a half-panic. Even at that late hour, the phone was answered within two rings and the man who answered was very alert, he listened carefully, got my request right the first time, stayed calm, and arranged for Miami Fire and Rescue to call me - which they did within the next 60 seconds. In another ten minutes, the EMS crew was in our room and in short order my wife was taken to nearby Baptist Hospital, which for us was an excellent choice. (My wife is fine now, thank the Lord.) During all this, the Hampton staff I dealt with were helpful and concerned. Even with shift changes, every staff person I dealt with was up to speed on what was going on with us, and they worked with me for the late checkout time I needed later that day. Of course we'd rather have spent our last night in Miami at the Dadeland Hampton Inn than at the $1,000-plus a night hospital room we ended up in, but for this Hampton's great service and their professional help in a frightening time, we were most grateful.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and good value”
Reviews.Author: swivellingmonk
Reviews.Content: Overall an excellent choice for a few days in Miami. Lovely room, very helpful staff and a great free breakfast including cereals, fruit, pastries, hot biscuits, waffles, sausage patties etc. Loads of free parking. Very close to Dadeland Mall and approximately half an hours drive to South Beach. We had difficulty finding the place, but we're not used to driving in the US and had just come off a 9 hour flight!!

Reviews.Title: “Quite Nice”
Reviews.Author: Xacuti
Reviews.Content: It was a nice stay for us. The plus points: It is quiet, clean, comfortable and affordable. At the complimentary breakfast the fruits are fresh and the coffee of a decent quality. The negative points: While it is fairly close to the shopping malls and the metro, the access is not walk-friendly. One needs a car esp as the 'hotel shuttle' appears to do little shuttling. One needs a car to get around. And yes, the hot breakfast is worth a skip. In the final analysis, we had a comfortable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Orange bowl stay 2008”
Reviews.Author: SEKStraveler
Reviews.Content: Hotel can be a bit difficult to locate, but follow directions on US 1 and look for the hotel near the traffic bridge. Hotel was fully booked with seasonal travelers and individuals like myself who were attending the Orange Bowl game. It was very cold in Miami during the dates of my stay, and we needed to use the in room heater, which had not been used in some time. The room smelled of the never used heater for the night...but we adjusted. The hotel has an adequate business center that can be accessed with a special key. Hot tub was fine as was pool. Breakfast was standard fare for Hampton Inn, but the hotel was not providing the brown bag to go breakfast bags, which I use as I always sleep in. Rooms were quiet and clean, bed was very comfortable. Plenty of resturants nearby....so food choices are ample.... Front desk staff was more than willing to assist... Saturday am breakfast was unique as all the weekend travelers meant that the yoounger kids were attacking the breakfast bar, so be prepared, but the hotel staff does its best to try and keep up, even though I watched people step in front of them.... Overall, consistent quality that can be expected from a Hampton Inn... KU won the Orange Bowl so we were all happy, but the Virgina Tech fans who stayed in this hotel were sad....

Reviews.Title: “Good Budget Hotel If You Have Your Own Transport”
Reviews.Author: StuartSussex
Reviews.Content: This hotel gives pretty much what you would expect for a budget hotel. Rooms were good sized & only slightly dated with all major facilities included. They do non-smoking rooms as well, though the one I was offered smelt badly of cigarettes (but it was changed without any problem). For food you really need to go out (though there were a lot of delivery pizza leaflets in the room).
