I did not find this any problem with restaurants around Dadeland Mall being easy to get to by courtesy bus or cab (about $7). There are cabs outside the Mall entrance for getting back. Breakfast was OK (for free!) but not overly healthy in options. For myself, I would stay closer to Dadeland Mall next time, but this is only on location. The hotel itself was a good option as a budget stopover.

Reviews.Title: “excellent value”
Reviews.Author: dedicated-doctor
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hampton inn, dadeland for 4 nights in the beginning of november. The hotel is very clean, there is is free parking and the breakfast is fairly good. There is also a business center with free internet and the hotel is very close to a major mall. The only disadvantage is its location, about 20 min from south beach and 10 min from coconut grove, more during rush hours. But since one cannot stay in Miami without renting a car, quality for price is excellent. Would definitely return there

Reviews.Title: “Return Stay a Winner”
Reviews.Author: WeekendGetaways43
Reviews.Content: As things worked out, we were pleased to have 2 return stays at this Hampton this month. As in my previous stay, the staff was very kind and the hotel is just what I expect from Hampton : clean, quiet, comfortable and spacious. The free breakfast is good for a free breakfast but if you want something better, there is a Roasters and Toasters restaurant about a half mile south on US 1 which is pretty good. The pool area is clean with a hot tub available as well. One glitch on this stay was the in-room movies were not working. Wasn't sure if it was the remote control, but wasn't really interested much either. The cleaning staff was very good. I like the coziness of this Hampton. Love the Free WiFI at most Hamptons since it is very convenient for getting my work done. I stayed in a King Study with Sofa. This room unlike my stay last December did not have a small fridge, so ask for a room with one if you need one. If you're into shopping, there's Dadeland Mall about a quarter mile away or across the street is a shopping center with a Best Buy, Target, Sport's Authority, Michael's and a Bed, Bath & Beyond. Just remember from my previous review, if you're not from Miami, the hotel may be a little difficult to find. There are signs on US 1 just past the Dadeland North Metrorail Station( heading south). If you miss the turns, call the hotel for directions. Also as with Hampton, there is free parking; however, this hotel is so popular, the parking lot fills up quickly. There are spaces in the very rear which is well lit up at night. The Bed is the BEST with excellent comforter and duvet... spare pillow and thermal blanket are in the closet.. ( my wife is very picky due to a bad back and she loves these beds!) As I may have said in a previous review of a Hilton or the Conrad, I think that even though Hampton is not full service hotel, it may very well be a better value than it's more expensive cousins.

Reviews.Title: “Helpful staff much appreciated”
Reviews.Author: Blondie247772
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland for one night in June 2007. The room was spacious and the bed enormous. Although the room was generally clean, I did drop an earplug behind one of the bedside cabinets and didn't appreciate finding an old, used condom when I tried to retrieve it! The hotel is conveniently located to the US-1 and the Miami Dadeland mall. The hotel staff were extremely helpful, happy to offer any assistance they could. Breakfast was okay, but a little crowded as it's so popular. All in all, I'd recommend this hotel, just don't go looking behind the furniture!

Reviews.Title: “Smart Choice”
Reviews.Author: J-Adum
Reviews.Content: I am Ecuadorian and stayed at this Hotel in November 2006. I went with my wife and my 3 years old son for a week. Here are my highlights: 1. Excelent if you are shopping. The hotel is in the middle of Dadeland Mall and Dadeland Station Mall (at walking distance), 2 terrific places to shop. Also it is one block from the US-1 where you will find many other Malls like The Falls, Merrick Park and so on. 2. Great for one night stand. They have a complimentary shuttle which takes you from/ to the airport and 2 miles around the hotel. 3. Eventhough it is extremely well located, the rooms are so quiet and beds so great, you will rest for sure. 4. Complimentary breakfast is OK, nothing spectacular but enough to start the day. Good coffee though. They serve biscuits in the afternoon too. 5. Rooms are well sized and clean with a small fridge and microwave, really convenient. Free self park. 6. Staff is very friendly. They gave every morning Springhill bottled water to my son, which I consider a nice touch. Tip: You won't see the hotel from the US-1, so look for a small sign on you right, going south, just after Dadeland Station Mall. There turn right.

Reviews.Title: “loved the bed”
Reviews.Author: TrinidadSuz
Reviews.Content: stayed for two days. The bed was the best I have slept in even better than many 5 star hotels such as the Loews. Location was excellent for me since I wanted to shop. Hotel also provided transport to and from airport which I had not expected. I would definitely return...very good value for the price!!

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT VALUE FOR PRICE”
Reviews.Author: TECKMAN
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed here for 5 days. Rooms were super clean. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Loved the fact that the room had microwave and refrigerator. Free breakfast was an added bonus. The DSL allowed me to keep in contact with my office. Very easy to use. Would definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Lisa011
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this basic' hotel for 4 nights as it was located near our friend's house. we had flown from the Uk for a short break. The hotel picked us up from the airport in good time as we called them from the passport queue not when we had got our luggage. Rooms were very clean and spacious and all staff very helpul. Breakfast included but lousy but luckily Dadeland MAll is 5 mins walk away. Also 5 mins away id the station to downtown miami. Ideally though need a car.

HotelInfo.Name: Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland
HotelInfo.Address: 8200 SW 70 Ave, Miami, FL 33143
